description:
In this course you will learn how you can make great white board animation HD video without expensive hardware equipment. For this kind of white board animation, you don't need a white board, expensive camera and lightning system, You don't even need illustration skills, You just need the Camtasia Studio, this course and a little of your patience. And you will become a professional white board animation artist.

I will show you how to create amazing hand drawn whiteboard sketch video with only camtasia software and nothing else. However if you want to improve your graphic then photoshop or some editing software will be required.

You do not need to learn a new software, do not need to pay for subscription ever. Create a whiteboard sketch video is easy. In under 1 hour you will be making your 1st sketch video.

P/S This is not a course that teach you how to use Camtasia

Join me on the other side. Enroll now

As a Bonus you get to download the hand image that I use for the course for FREE. The whole Hand image I use and create is over 35mb.
title: Create Hand Drawn Whiteboard Sketch Video using Camtasia
